Title: Joey Potter and the Capeside Redemption
Plot: When Dawson gives up his dream of making his film, a strong-minded Joey rallies the old group back to Capeside to help Dawson begin production before pursuing her dream of traveling to Paris. Jen, Jack and Grams must say their goodbyes and leave for New York.
GuestStars: Nicole Steinwedell, Lukas Behnken, Taylor Handley, Matthew Stanton, Troy Rudeseal, Megan Blake, Rick Warner, Michael Genevie, Allan Edwards, Calvin Brown
